Summary: Orange fireball moving west to east.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rehoboth
There were no other sightings in Rehoboth on or around July 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailswhile sitting outside on the night of the 4th, i turned to my left and noticed an object in the sky moving slowly from west to east. the object was about 1\4" at arms length and was reddish orange. there was no tail and no sound. the object went from a bright glow, dimming to extinguished. the event lasted approximately 30 seconds and was also seen by my wife.
